page.title: 01Rural Thurloxton Somerset
page.content: The area is dominated by agriculture because of high quality Grade 1 red soil, producing mainly corn and arable crops. Beef, sheep and some dairy animals graze the less accessible fields for tractors. Another dominant feature are numerous electricity pylons providing energy for outlying homestad. Most homes had at least one car parked, outside, in the drive or in a personal garage. Many houses, previously homes of farm workers had eiter been sold and renovated, or let to individuals, families connected with wide range of service industries not just farming. Very few homes built in last 30yrs those that have, mainly luxury bungalows, houses. Evidence of many homes being renovated. Few services, food paprs post milk etc all delivered by cars, vans, if at all.
